descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/67867-1-1441349801.jpg[/img]


[size=3]This mod adds a standalone male follower.[/size]


[b][size=3][Follower detail][/size][/b]


[size=3]Name: Teron the Reprobate
Level: 5 - No limit
Voice: Even Toned
Weight: 50
Location: Dead Man's Drink, Falkreath
Combat Style: Dual Wielding+Conjuration
Perks:
Stealth, Muffled Movement, Light Foot, Silence
Dual Flurry, Novice Conjuration, Multiple Souls(Custom)
ETC: Marriage possible, Essential[/size]


[b][size=3][Recommended Mods][/size]
[/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]Face Light by tktk1[/url] (I recommend the 'FacelightDark Target' spell)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15698]Proper Dark brotherhood armor retex by Stivmachine[/url] (I recommend the black version)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster[/url]


[size=3][b][Credit][/b]
[/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951]Enhance Character Edit by tktk[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19159]Mens Underwear replacer by Imperator3[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26145]Smooth Male Body by Urshi[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29977]XCE - Warpaint and Dirt by Xenius[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33391]Face Masks of Skyrim by volvaga0
[/url]Male Texture by Gonzo
KS Hairdos


[b][size=3][Change Log][/size][/b]


[b]v1.1[/b]
changes the appearance of Teron
